abstract: Rachel A Dolezal quits as NAACP chapter president in Spokane, Wash, amid claims that she lied about her ethnicity; has claimed for years that her background was partly black, but her parents say she has no black ancestry.
lead_paragraph: Years ago, Ms. Dolezal, who is accused of deceiving people about her race, apparently sued Howard University, charging that it had discriminated against her — in part for being white.

headline.main: Rachel Dolezal Leaves N.A.A.C.P. Post as Past Discrimination Suit Is Revealed
headline.print_headline: N.A.A.C.P. Chapter Leader Resigns Amid Claims She Lied About Ethnicity

snippet: Years ago, Ms. Dolezal, who is accused of deceiving people about her race, apparently sued Howard University, charging that it had discriminated against her — in part for being white.

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations
